about_the_game:
In the ancient Middle Ages, a lot of zombies have appeared in an abandoned village. As a member of the Seabird Strike Team, you were reasonably assigned to check it out. Your captain gives you a total of 6 different weapons that you need to use to defeat hordes of zombies. The captain will also keep replenishing your resources from the rear. Go for the kill.

Game Features:
⚪ You are a beautiful sexy girl.
⚪ legions of zombies will be constantly searching for you.
⚪ 6 A superweapon is at your disposal.
⚪ Talent and achievement systems help you reach new heights.

Game play:
⚪ WSAD control movement SHIFT acceleration running mouse control view,
⚪ In the game, press the ESC key to view the Settings panel.
⚪ Each wave of zombies killed will refresh a new wave of more powerful zombies.
⚪ Upgrade character stats when the energy bar is full.

content_descriptors.notes: The game character is more revealing. Scenes in which a character attacks a zombie will involve blood-pumping effects.
